name: XRReferenceSpaceEventInit
description: The XRReferenceSpaceEventInit dictionary is used when calling the XRReferenceSpaceEvent() constructor to provide the values for its properties. Since the properties are read-only, this is the only opportunity available to set their values.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The XRReferenceSpaceEventInit dictionary is used when calling the XRReferenceSpaceEvent() constructor to provide the values for its properties. Since the properties are read-only, this is the only opportunity available to set their values.

You will not usually need to use this, since these events are created by the WebXR infrastructure.
